{{Wired embedded system |brand=Check Point |model=L-50 |revision=(CPAP-SG1120-FW) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=SG-80A |availability=EoL (06/2022) |price=600 |est_release_date=04/2013 |pcb_id=490ADK00C-1.6MM |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU128M8GE-AC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=ExpressCard/34 (USB), USB 2.0 (Type A) |expansion_expresscard_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6171R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, RS-232 transciever;Intersil;ICL3243E;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Hub Controller;NEC;Î¼PD720114;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS9435A;;1;,,, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Switcher w/ Integrated FET;Texas Instruments;TPS54327;;2;,,, 2A 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power Systems;MP1482DS;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS65251;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, metal case, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Check Point version: 983002039; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.18; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=set on first login |oui_eth=00:1C:7F }} {{TagLine|Check Point L-50 Network Appliance}} :''with 8-Port Gigabit LAN Switch'' :[https://www.cpug.org/forums/showthread.php/18672-Check-Point-1100-Appliance-FAQ User Group FAQ]
Check Point L-50 - 8 Port Gigabit Firewall Appliance :CPAP-SG1120-FW
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 (@1.2GHz) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND Flash, SD Card Slot *Network: 12x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports
